scene.title: Flaw

text.p: 「Eagle」 was also looking for an opportunity,
To this end, he planned to take the initiative to expose his flaws.

scene.text: The openings were also easy to find: his own cheeks.

text.p: 「Eagle」 had already figured out the girl's temperament,
and her target of attack would never turn elsewhere unless she took back that "slap".
If you knew your enemy's intentions,
they would no longer be a danger, but a life-saving charm instead.
While attacking with full force, 「Eagle」 only needed to guard the top of the shoulder.
They were both fighting for their life, but the pressure on 「Eagle」 was much lighter than Li Sushang.
Of course, he didn't plan to fulfill any "bet",
The Xuanyuan Sword would stay, and Li Sushang's life would be forfeit. [\s]
For this reason, another slap did not make much of a difference.

scene.text: From the beginning, this was an unfair battle.

text.p: 「Eagle」 did everything possible and exhausted all his special skills. The purpose was not to injure the enemy,
but to get close to the place where the [Xuanyuan Sword] was located.

mono.p: As soon as the two sides fought, 「Eagle」 knew that this girl was young but her skills were unbelievably profound.
Not to mention her strength and speed, just the effort of changing moves and transforming energy of Roaring Tiger freely , could make her be counted as a first-class expert in the martial arts.
For this alone, he was far from being her match.
If the fight dragged on, he would undoubtedly lose.
——If he follow the rules that is.
「Eagle」 wasn’t a person who obeyed the rules. [\s]
What he wanted was not to win, but to conquer.
This was the third advantage: 「Purpose」. The same was 「Victory」"
「Eagle」's 「Victory」 was completely different from of Li Sushang's 「Victory」.
What the girl pursued was the victory of the "match."
What 「Eagle」 wanted was the victory of the "war."
"Victory of the war"... meant getting what you want, destroying what you want to destroy.
Use the opponent's "target" to protect oneself,
use one’s own "flaws" to lure the enemy,
and then use that sharp "sword" to kill.

text.p: This was the trap set by 「Eagle」. [\s]
So far, every step had met his expectations,

scene.text: Sushang receded slowly, but from the lighter movements and expressions, he judged that the girl had become accustomed to his attacks.
The scale of victory and defeat would not always lean towards one side, and the weight that symbolized superiority changed all the time.
The result of this battle must be determined within a few seconds.
He kept pushing, approaching the 「Xuanyuan Sword」...

text.p: The sword was inserted in the bluestone ground beside him. [\s]
The layout had been completed and the net was ready to be closed.
